message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's value to you is $1000000.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. What do you think?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $850000 just yet. I'm willing to compromise further and sell the product to you for $900000. This is the highest price I'm willing to consider at this point.

I understand that you're willing to compromise further, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $875000. This is the highest I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and sell the product to you for $885000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're willing to make one more compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $880000. This is the highest I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to be closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $890000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're willing to make one more compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $882500. This is the highest I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I'm getting close to walking away from this deal. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to be closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $895000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're willing to make one more compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $887500. This is the highest I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement.
